resources.string: 该屏蔽系统会在 EHentai 网站评论系统的基础上继续屏蔽评论。\n\n评论者屏蔽项：排除该评论者上传的评论。这会使加载画廊列表花费更多时间。
根据账号名称屏蔽他人评论
解决某些地区的 DNS 污染问题
url伪装(需重启，开启后账户功能失效)
应用提供的主机到IP的映射\n可被自定义 hosts.txt 覆盖
检测到开启了vpn，请注意您的网络安全
A cookie is a small piece of data stored in web browser. Google it if you don\'t know what it is or how to get it.\n\nPlease enter special cookies to sign in.
It seems that the cookies you entered are wrong. You\'d better check them.
It seems download location is not available. Please set it in Settings.
There is a gallery url in the clipboard
The content of this application is from the Internet. Some of it may do physical or mental harm to you. You have learnt the risks above and would like to undertake them.
Username cannot be an empty string
Password cannot be an empty string
If this issue continues, try \"Sign in via WebView\" or \"Sign in via cookies\"

Perhaps it is a mistake due to website update or something wrong happened. You may try sign in via WebView or enter cookie or skip signing in under sign in button. But you may be a "Sad Panda" after skipping signing in. Try "Sign in via cookies" first if you had signed in on 0.6.x version.
EhViewer will request WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission for downloading gallery. Do you want to grant the permission?

Would you mind if the developer collected your device information and your usage? It will help the developer a lot.

Data analysis service is provided by Google Analytics for Firebase. Its privacy policy can be found at https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/.

If you agree to join data analysis, your device information and your usage will be collected, including but not limited to Android API version, equipment model, language residence, the application version, conversion time, function times. The developer promise that these information will NOT be collected, including phone number, e-mail address, IMEI.

Your information will not be collected until you agree to join data analysis.

The collected information will be analyzed by Google Analytics for Firebase. The analysis report can only be viewed by the developer of this application.
Which gallery site do you want to visit?
e-hentai: available for anyone\nexhentai: available for who has signed in
You are using the latest version of EhViewer.
The World is Big and the panda sit alone
Subscribe to tags in Settings->EH->My tags
There is no more data for the current listing

Normal search: Simply search.

Subscription search: Search in subscriptions.

Specify uploader: Search for galleries uploaded by the specified uploader. All other options will be ignored.

Specify tag: Search for galleries that contain the specified tag. Only one tag accepted. Other options will be ignored.
Quick search will be shown here
The state of gallery list will be saved as quick search. Perform a search first to save the state of search panel.
Can\'t add image search as quick search
A duplicate quick search exists. The name is \"%s\".
This name is already in use.
Download items will be shown here
Image limit has been reached. Please stop download and have a relax.
Reset the reading progress of all downloaded galleries?
Download labels will be shown here
Viewed galleries will be shown here

This blocking system filters the result of EHentai website blocking system.

Title Blocker: exclude the gallery whose title contains the word.

Uploader Blocker: exclude the gallery which was uploaded by the uploader.

Tag Blocker: exclude the gallery which contain the tag, it takes more time to get gallery list.

Tag Namespace Blocker: exclude the gallery which contain the tag namespace, it takes more time to get gallery list.
Draw a pattern to set pattern protection\nLeave blank to clear pattern protection
Tap the check mark to save the settings
App file directory %d (it will be remove after uninstalling the app)
Restart the application to sign in
Do you really want to sign out?
You have signed out. Restart the application to sign in again
Cookies can be used to sign in
It is not recommended to enable it except in special circumstances.

Identity cookies can be used to sign in to this account.
KEEP IT SAFE

%s
Apply theme color to navigation bar
Currently %s. Certain resolutions might cause getting thumb failed
The categories shown as default on Homepage
Hide galleries in certain languages from the gallery list and searches
Exclude certain namespaces from a default tag search
Require enabling Japanese Title in Settings on EHentai website
Display the number of pages in the gallery list
Show tag translations instead of the original text (It takes time to download the data file)
Block gallery by title, uploader and tags
Use volume key to turn pages

On Android 4.4+, apps can\'t write any data on your external SD card, unless you root the system and apply a patch. But <SD card>/Android/data/com.hippo.ehviewer is an exception. It is writable for this app.
Android 5.0+ provides new API to write on external SD card. Tap the \"DOCUMENT\" if you want to set SD card as download location.
Please hide your gallery apps away from other people
Most gallery apps will ignore pictures in the download path
Currently %s. Resolutions above 1280x may not work
The paging function will only take effect when the list length is greater than 500
It is dangerous! You may get 509 error
Download in sequence when downloading all galleries
Restore all download items in download location
Not found download items to restore
Remove gallery images which are not in download list but in download location
Redundancy cleaning completed, clean-up %d items totally
Save html content when parsing error
Save crash log when app crashes
Crash logs help developers fix bugs
Gallery download path might be wrong and it need to be redownloaded. Clearing download path cache might solve the problem.
Clear thumb, gallery info memory cache
Apply the built-in host-to-IP mapping provided by the app.\nIt can be overridden by custom hosts.txt.
Map hostnames to IP addresses.\nIt can override built-in hosts.txt.
Pattern protection has not been set
Save data like download list, quick search list, to external storage
Load data which were previously saved
Receive migration data from Wi Fi hotspots
EhViewer is not affiliated with E-Hentai.org in any way
EhViewer is made possible thanks to many open source projects
Your donation can not bring you any privileges. But it helps me maintain this app.
Beta versions may contain unsolved bugs.
Swipe left to open quick search panel
Swipe left to open download labels panel
Tap the thumbnail to view gallery detail
Long click to open page menu
Need H@H client for archive download
Prevent the content of the app from being taken screenshots of or shown in the \"Recent Apps\" list.
Are you sure you want to change the background?
The background modification is limited to this software and cannot be synchronized to E-hentai or other similar software.
Are you sure you want to change your avatar?
The avatar modification is limited to this software and cannot be synchronized to E-hentai or other similar software.
EhViewer will request access to the device camera in order to take pictures. Would you like to authorize?
EhViewer will request access to the device\'s photo album in order to obtain pictures. Would you like to authorize?
数据迁移中请稍候或退出重试
Please make sure that the mobile phone to receive data is connected to the local hotspot, and do not disconnect or return to the parent page before the migration is complete!
The device is connected successfully. After receiving the data, please restart the app to make the data take effect.
There is currently no need to reset quotas, please try again after refreshing~
